member.name: T:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.Converters.CallConverter
member.summary: Handle dumb rule of Id present for requests and not present for notifications

member.name: T:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.Converters.JsonRpcIdConverter
member.summary: Handle dumb rule of Id as string/number/null for requests and responses

member.name: T:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.Converters.RequestWrapperConverter
member.summary: Handle dumb rule of request being single or batch

member.name: T:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.Converters.ResponseWrapperConverter
member.summary: Handle dumb rule of response being single on some batch errors

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.RequestItemKey
member.summary: Parsed IUntypedCall, stored in HttpContext.Items after successful reading of JSON Rpc request

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.NestedPipelineItemKey
member.summary: When set in HttpContext.Items, denotes that this is nested pipeline with copied HttpContext, started from JsonRpcMiddleware

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ActionResultTypeItemKey
member.summary: Type of ActionResult returned from MVC action or filter. Stored in HttpContext.Items

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ControllerMethodSeparator
member.summary: "." Delimiter in "controller_name.action_name" to mimic "Class.Method" notation

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.IdProperty
member.summary: "id" JSON property to look for Id in single request

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ResultProperty
member.summary: "result" JSON property to look for successful response data in single response

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ErrorProperty
member.summary: "error" JSON property to look for error in single response

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.Version
member.summary: "2.0" JSON Rpc version

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ReservedMethodPrefix
member.summary: "rpc." Specification restricts use of methods with this prefix

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ExceptionCode
member.summary: -32000 Server Error. Usually happens on unhandled Exception

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.InternalExceptionCode
member.summary: -32001 Server Error. Usually caused by JsonRpcInternalException. May indicate that you are trying to return HTTP code or ActionResult not supported or disabled by your configuration, or an internal bug.

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.DefaultRoute
member.summary: "api/jsonrpc" Default route for JSON Rpc controllers

member.name: F:Tochka.JsonRpc.Common.JsonRpcConstants.ContentType
member.summary: "application/json" Default content-type expected in JSON Rpc HTTP requests
